mapper.select: SELECT proDoneNumber.doneNum as 'value', proscrapNumber.scrapNumber AS 'scrapvalue', date_format(proSfcNumByTimeRange.rangeEnd, '%H:%i') as 'name', proSfcNumByTimeRange.rangeDoneNum as 'rangeDoneNum', (ls.shoporder_numbers - proDoneNumber.doneNum - proscrapNumber.scrapNumber) as 'otvalue', ls.shoporder_numbers as 'all' FROM (select #{scheduler} as shoporderId, timeRange.rangeStart, timeRange.rangeEnd, COUNT(sfcProData.sfc) as rangeDoneNum from ( select lss.shoporderId,finish_time,lss.sfc from iemes.ly_shoporder_sfc lss where 1=1 and lss.site = #{site} and lss.shoporderId = #{scheduler} and lss.status = 2 and lss.finish_time >= CURRENT_DATE )sfcProData right join ( select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 0 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 2 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 2 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 4 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 4 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 6 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 6 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 8 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 8 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 10 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 10 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 12 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 12 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 14 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 14 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 16 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 16 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 18 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 18 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 20 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 20 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 22 hour) as rangeEnd UNION select adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 22 hour) as rangeStart,adddate(CURRENT_DATE,interval 24 hour) as rangeEnd )timeRange on sfcProData.finish_time >= timeRange.rangeStart AND sfcProData.finish_time < timeRange.rangeEnd group by sfcProData.shoporderId,timeRange.rangeStart ,timeRange.rangeEnd )proSfcNumByTimeRange left join iemes.ly_shoporder ls on proSfcNumByTimeRange.shoporderId = ls.shoporder_no left join (select shoporderId, count(sfc) as doneNum from iemes.ly_shoporder_sfc where 1=1 and site = #{site} and shoporderId = #{scheduler} and status = 2 group by shoporderId )proDoneNumber on proSfcNumByTimeRange.shoporderId = proDoneNumber.shoporderId LEFT JOIN (SELECT shoporderId, COUNT(sfc) AS scrapNumber FROM iemes.ly_shoporder_sfc WHERE 1 = 1 AND site = #{site} AND shoporderId = #{scheduler} AND STATUS = 3 GROUP BY shoporderId) proscrapNumber ON proSfcNumByTimeRange.shoporderId = proscrapNumber.shoporderId WHERE 1=1 and ls.site = #{site} and ls.shoporder_no = #{scheduler} order by proSfcNumByTimeRange.rangeStart

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(ss.`sfc`) 'done', (ls.`shoporder_numbers`- (COUNT(ss.`sfc`)) )'nodown', ls.`shoporder_numbers` 'all' FROM ly_shoporder_sfc ss, `ly_shoporder` ls WHERE 1=1 AND ss.`shoporderId` = ls.`shoporder_no` AND ss.`shoporderId` = 'sh003'

select * from ( select shoporder_item ,fdate, count(sfc) num from ( select SFC, date_format(ss.finishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') fdate ,so.shoporder_item from ly_sfc_step ss ,ly_operation op ,ly_shoporder so where op.default_resource=#{resource} and ss.operation = op.operation_no and ss.site = #{site} and ss.shoporder = so.shoporder_no and so.shoporder_item =#{shoporder_item} and so.site = #{site} )m group by shoporder_item,fdate order by fdate desc)n limit 0,7

select * from ( select shoporder_item,fdate, count(sfc) num from ( select SFC, date_format(ss.finishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') fdate ,so.shoporder_item from ly_sfc_step ss ,ly_shoporder so where ss.workcenter = #{workcenter2} and ss.site = #{site} and ss.shoporder = so.shoporder_no and so.shoporder_item = #{shoporder_item} and so.site = #{site} )m group by shoporder_item,fdate order by fdate desc)n limit 0,7

select * from ( select shoporder_item,fdate, count(sfc) num from ( select DISTINCT SFC, date_format(ss.finishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') fdate ,so.shoporder_item from ly_sfc_step ss ,ly_shoporder so ,ly_workcenter_relation wr where ss.workcenter = wr.workcenter_child and wr.workcenter = #{workcenter} and ss.site = #{site} and ss.shoporder = so.shoporder_no and so.shoporder_item =#{shoporder_item} and so.site = #{site})m group by shoporder_item,fdate order by fdate desc)n limit 0,7

select so.shoporder_item,li.item_name, li.item_type, st.sfc, sa.item_sfc, sa.create_time, sa.use_num,wr.workcenter, st.workcenter as workcenter_child, lo.default_resource,st.operation, st.byUser from ly_sfc_step st left join ly_operation lo on lo.operation_no = st.operation left join ly_workcenter_relation wr on wr.workcenter_child = st.workcenter ,ly_sfc_assembly sa , ly_shoporder_sfc ss left join ly_shoporder so on so.shoporder_no = ss.shoporderID left join ly_item li on li.item_no = so.shoporder_item where ss.sfc = sa.sfc and st.site = #{site} and sa.site = #{site} and ss.site = #{site} and lo.site = #{site} and li.site = #{site} and so.site = #{site} and wr.site = #{site} and st.operation = sa.operation and st.sfc = sa.sfc and st.sfc = #{sfc} order by st.createTime, sa.create_time;

select ss.sfc, li.item_no, li.item_name, li.item_desc, li.bom_no, li.item_type, li.create_time, li.by_user, li.site from ly_shoporder_sfc ss left join ly_shoporder so on ss.shoporderId = so.shoporder_no left join ly_item li on so.shoporder_item = li.item_no where ss.site = #{site} and so.site =#{site} and li.site = #{site}

SELECT lsa.id,lsa.`item_sfc`,it.item_no, it.item_name,it.item_desc,it.item_type,lsa.site,lsa.by_user,lsa.create_time FROM `ly_sfc_assembly` lsa LEFT JOIN `ly_item` it ON lsa.`item` = it.`item_no` WHERE it.site = #{site}

SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM ( SELECT ss.shoporderid,ss.sfc,wr.workcenter 'cj', lss.workcenter 'cx',op.default_resource FROM ly_shoporder_sfc ss ,ly_sfc_step lss ,ly_operation op,ly_workcenter_relation wr WHERE ss.sfc=lss.sfc AND lss.operation = op.operation_no AND lss.workcenter = wr.workcenter_child AND ss.status =2 AND finish_time IS NOT NULL) a WHERE cj ='w001'

SELECT lwi.`item` 'name', (IFNULL(SUM(lwi.`receive`),0)-IFNULL(sy.us,0)) 'value' FROM ly_workshop_inventory lwi LEFT JOIN ( SELECT lsa.item, SUM(lsa.`use_num`) us FROM ly_sfc_assembly lsa where site = #{site} GROUP BY lsa.`item` ) sy ON lwi.`item` = sy.item where lwi.site = #{site} GROUP BY lwi.`item`

select a.nc_numbers, (shoporder_numbers) as pass_numbers from (SELECT count(distinct sn.sfc) as nc_numbers FROM ly_sfc_nc sn , ly_shoporder_sfc ss, ly_shoporder so, ly_item li, ly_sfc_step lss, ly_operation op, ly_nc_code nc, ly_nc_code_relation ncr, ly_nc_code_group ncg, ly_workcenter_relation wr, ly_workcenter wo WHERE sn.sfc = ss.sfc AND ss.shoporderid= so.shoporder_no AND so.shoporder_item = li.item_no AND sn.sfc=lss.sfc AND sn.operation = lss.operation AND sn.operation = op.operation_no AND sn.nc_code = ncr.nc_code AND sn.nc_code = nc.nc_code AND ncr.nc_code_group = ncg.nc_code_group_no AND wr.workcenter_child = lss.workcenter
AND so.shoporder_no = #{scheduler}
AND wo.workcenter_no = #{workcenter} and wo.workcenter_class = 'workshop'
AND wo.workcenter_no = #{workcenter2} and wo.workcenter_class = 'production_line'
AND wr.workcenter = wo.workcenter_no) a, (select shoporder_numbers from ly_shoporder ls where ls.site = #{site} and ls.shoporder_no = #{scheduler}) b

select lso.shoporder_no,lso.shoporder_numbers,count(DISTINCT lsn.sfc) nc from ly_shoporder lso left join ly_shoporder_sfc lsos on lso.shoporder_no = lsos.shoporderId and lsos.site = #{site} LEFT JOIN ly_sfc_nc lsn on lsos.sfc = lsn.sfc and lsn.site = #{site} where lso.site = #{site} GROUP BY lso.shoporder_no order by lso.id

select lso.shoporder_no,lso.shoporder_numbers,count(DISTINCT lsos.sfc) complete from ly_shoporder lso left join ly_shoporder_sfc lsos on lso.shoporder_no = lsos.shoporderId and lsos.`status` = 2 and lsos.site = #{site} where lso.site = #{site} GROUP BY lso.shoporder_no order by lso.id

SELECT sfcData.operation_no,sfcData.operation_description,sfcData.operationResource_no,sfcData.sfc,sfcData.shoporder_item,sfcData.shoporder_no, sfcData.stepStatus as stepStatus,sfcData.byUser,sfcData.createTime,sfcData.site,assemblyNum.assemblyNum, ncNum.ncNum from (SELECT lo.operation_no,lo.operation_description,lor.operationResource_no,lsStep.sfc,ls.shoporder_item,ls.shoporder_no, lsStep.status as stepStatus,lsStep.byUser,lsStep.createTime,lsStep.site FROM iemes.ly_sfc_step lsStep LEFT JOIN iemes.ly_operation lo ON lsStep.operation = lo.operation_no LEFT JOIN iemes.ly_operation_resource lor ON lsStep.operation = lor.operation LEFT JOIN iemes.ly_shoporder_sfc lss ON lsStep.sfc = lss.sfc LEFT JOIN iemes.ly_shoporder ls ON lss.shoporderId = ls.shoporder_no WHERE 1=1 AND lss.sfc = #{sfc} AND lss.site = #{site} )sfcData left join (select site,sfc,operation, COUNT(id) as assemblyNum from ly_sfc_assembly where 1=1 AND sfc = #{sfc} AND site = #{site} group by site,sfc,operation) assemblyNum on sfcData.site = assemblyNum.site and sfcData.sfc = assemblyNum.sfc and sfcData.operation_no = assemblyNum.operation left join (select site,sfc,operation, COUNT(id) as ncNum from ly_sfc_nc where 1=1 AND sfc = #{sfc} AND site = #{site} group by site,sfc,operation) ncNum on sfcData.site = ncNum.site and sfcData.sfc = ncNum.sfc and sfcData.operation_no = ncNum.operation
